Performance:
August 1986 National Bunraku Theatre, Osaka: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy

Production: August 1986 National Bunraku Theatre, Osaka

Play: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (菅原伝授手習鑑)

Scenes:

The Enrollment (寺入り / Terairi)

The Village School (寺子屋 / Terakoya)

Characters:

Prince Tokiyo (Tokiyo Shinnō / 斎世親王)

Shihei, Minister of the Left (Sadaijin Shihei / 左大臣時平 )

Michizane (Kanshōjō / 菅丞相)

Gemba (Shundō Genba / 春藤玄蕃)

Tenrankei (Tōshi Tenrankei / 唐使天蘭敬)

Matsuomaru (Matsuōmaru / 松王丸(舎人) )

Umeomaru (Umeōmaru / 梅王丸(舎人))

Sakuramaru (Sakuramaru / 桜丸(舎人))

Kariya (Kariyahime / 苅屋姫 )

Yae, Sakuramaru's wife (Nyōbō Yae / 女房八重)

Kiyotsura (Miyoshi Kiyotsura / 三善清貫)

Lady in waiting (Tsubone / 局 )

Katsuno, a maid (Koshimoto Katsuno / 腰元勝野)

Mareyo (Sachūben Mareyo / 左中弁希世)

Michizane's wife (Midaidokoro / 御台所)

Kanshusai (Kanshūsai / 菅秀才)

Genzo (Takebe Genzō / 武部源蔵 )

Tonami (Nyōbō Tonami / 女房戸浪)

Chikara (Arashima Chikara / 荒島主税 )

Boy (Satono warawa / 里の童)

Girl (Satono musume / 里の娘)

Housewife (Satono nyōbō / 里の女房 )

Tatsuta-no-mae (Tatsuta no mae / 立田前)

Terukuni (Hangandai Terukuni / 判官代輝国)

Kakuju (Oba Kakuju / 伯母覚寿)

Taro Sukune (Sukune Tarō / 宿禰太郎)

Hyoe (Hajino Hyōe / 土師兵衛)

False messenger (Nisemukai / 贋迎い)

Takunai (Yakko Takunai / 奴宅内)

Sugiomaru (Sugiōmaru / 杉王丸(舎人))

Shiratayu (Oya Shiratayū / 親白太夫)

Jussaku, a farmer (Hyakushō Jūsaku / 百姓十作)

Chiyo, Matsuomaru's wife (Nyōbō Chiyo / 女房千代)

Haru, Umeomaru's wife (Nyōbō Haru / 女房春)

Priest of Anrakuji Temple (Anrakuji no sō / 安楽寺の僧(住職))

Heima (Washizuka Heima / 鷲塚平馬)

Gengo (Hoshizaka Gengo / 星坂源吾)

Yodarekuri, a naughty boy (Yodarekuri / よだれくり)

Kotaro (Isshi Kotarō / 一子小太郎)

Sansuke, a servant (Genan Sansuke / 下男三助)

Priest Hossho (Hosshōbō Ajari / 法性坊阿闍梨 )

Apprentice priest (Deshisō / 弟子僧)

Children (Terako / 寺子(手習子))

Samurai (Iyo no uchizamurai / 伊予の内侍)

Constables (Torite / 捕手)

Janitors (Jichō / 仕丁)

Servants (Yakko / 奴)

Maid servants (Koshimoto / 腰元)

Farmers (Hyakushō / 百姓)
